wogwt.translatable.http
Class SubmitOnChangeListener

java.lang.Object
  wogwt.translatable.http.Updater
      wogwt.translatable.http.SubmitUpdater
          wogwt.translatable.http.SubmitOnChangeListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
SingleFieldSubmitOnChangeListener
public class SubmitOnChangeListener
extends SubmitUpdater

Sends the all the form values to the server using the form action url and updates a DOM container with the response Also see SingleFieldSubmitOnChangeListener to do an ajax submit that sends only a single form value.
